title: A Taste of St. Pete
post_excerpt: With micro-breweries on the rise, itâ€™s easy to discover specialty brews while on a beach vacation in St. Pete. ...
post_content:
With micro-breweries on the rise, it’s easy to discover specialty brews while on a beach vacation in St. Pete. New to the craft beer scene? We have you covered with top breweries you can’t miss while in town. Taste your way through:

Cycle Brewing – keep it local with a selection of locally-made brews and a selection of ongoing events and experiences as part of the “Keep Saint Petersburg Local” independent business alliance

Green Bench – think outdoor sipping on craft brews with family, friends and dogs. This downtown neighborhood spot is a 15-barrel brewhouse

3 Daughters – serving up 60 varieties of craft beers, 3 Daughters brings a passion for brewing together with a true sense of community

With Postcard Inn as your home base, it’s easy to taste your way through the birthplace of craft beer. See a full of breweries and local spots in the area to experience here.
